function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Compromised Indoor Environmental Quality (IEQ) leading to increased vulnerability to diseases","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and exacerbation of health issues for occupants","Mitigation":"Implementing proper design parameters and building operation to achieve ideal IEQ","Technologies":"Sensing and monitoring technology for real-time IEQ assessment","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Facility managers and designers"},{"Description":"Lack of pragmatic guidance for mitigating health risks in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and health issues for occupants","Mitigation":"Providing pragmatic guidance for occupants, facility managers, and designers","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and control systems for building management","People":"Occupants, facility managers, and designers","Owner":"Building management and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Limited understanding of the relationship between buildings and occupant health","Impact":"Inability to address health risks effectively and efficiently in the built environment","Mitigation":"Conducting systematic research to understand the effects of buildings on occupant health","Technologies":"Data analytics and modeling for building-health relationship analysis","People":"Research community, facility managers, and designers","Owner":"Research institutions, building management, and regulatory authorities"}]}
